How to ApplyAll your admission questions answered

If you're interested in joining the Indian School of Hospitality, our guide is here to help break down the application process into easy to follow steps. Following this guide will ensure you've got all the relevant paperwork ready and know the most convenient application method for your needs.

Discover our programme

Head over to our Four Year Hospitality Programme page to find out everything you need to know about the course. For more details on the course as well as ISH as a whole, request a digital copy of our prospectus.

Check the admissions criteria

Ensure you meet the relevant admissions criteria. In order to apply, prospective students need to have:

  • In the case of Higher Secondary School Certificate or State Boards, CBSE and ICSE, 40% marks in 12th standard with English as one of the subjects is the minimum requirement.
  • In the case of International Baccalaureate students, a diploma is the minimum requirement. International Baccalaureate certificate students are not eligible for admission.
  • In the case of Cambridge University students (GCE/IGCSE/GCSE examinations of the approved British Examination Bodies), 'A' Level certificate is the minimum requirement with 5 (Five) subjects in A, B, C Grades including English at Ordinary ('O') Level and 2/3 (Two/Three) subjects at Advanced Level.
  • Candidates in their 12th standard or equivalent class can also apply, provided they would be completing their final examination before 30th May, and can produce their 12th passing certificate / mark sheet before 31st August. Admission of such a candidate shall be strictly provisional until they submit the qualifying certificates before the prescribed last date.

Ensure you have all your documents

Make sure you have everything you need to complete the application form (e.g. education history, personal statement). Please note that the offer of admission is subject to verification of original certificates/transcripts at the time of admission. If any candidate is found ineligible at a later date even after admission to the institute, his/her admission will stand cancelled. Documents required for the application are:

  • School leaving certificate (mandatory)
  • Class X (or its equivalent) Certificate and mark sheet (mandatory)
  • Class XII (or its equivalent) Certificate and mark sheet (mandatory)
  • Employment certificate (if applicable)
  • Internship certificate (if applicable)
  • Certificates of merit (preferred)
  • Certificates of extracurriculars (preferred)
  • Certificates of co-curricular activities (preferred)

Ready to apply?

All applications to the Indian School of Hospitality will be open soon. To be notified of our application window opening, fill out the relevant fields on our Contact Us page and we'll let you know as soon as you can begin your application process.

Advice and assistance

If you require advice or assistance in completing your application please contact us through our Contact Us page.
